posts.post_content:
Hello,

A very presentable T3 Turkey Red of Mordecai "Three-Finger" Brown.  Very clean 1-75 checklist back.

SOLD - Thank you!

LOTS of other T3s available in all conditions, including many HOFers.  Please email or PM with any questions.  They are all priced to sell, offers accepted as well.

Happy Collecting,
Craig
